other_title: 万能野菜 ニンニンマン (Japanese)
plot: Mari-chan is a very young girl who is having dreams of being forced to eat her least favorite food: carrot, pepper, and milk. After an incident at her kindergarten where she forces herself to eat these vegetables and drink milk, she is unexpectedly visited by Ninninman, Piiman, and Milk.
ending_theme: "Ninninman!" (ニンニンマン！; Carrotman!) by Shuuhei Kita
